casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

September 26, 2008

[Cite as 09126/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-0hio-4880.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-2443. State v. Pasqualone.

Ashtabula App. No. 2007-A-0005, 2007-Ohio-6725. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Ashtabula County. Upon consideration the motion for leave of amicus curiae, Office of the Ohio Attorney General, to participate in oral argument scheduled for Wednesday, October 8, 2008, in support of appellant,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted and amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to appellant.
